scripts.build-release: npm run build-wasm-release && npm run build-api
scripts.build-release-all: npm run build-wasm-release && npm run build-wasm-release-mt && npm run build-api
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-wasm-debug && npm run build-api
scripts.publish-repo: npm run set-version && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.build-publish-repo: npm run set-version && npm run build-release-all && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.build-wasm-debug: mkdir -p dist && em++ -g --bind -lworkerfs.js -O3 -std=c++17 -flto --define-macro=REAL_T_IS_DOUBLE -I ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/manifold/include/ -I ./src/wasm/deps/glm/ ./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/collider/libcollider.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/third_party/graphlite/libgraphlite.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/manifold/libmanifold.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/polygon/libpolygon.a -fexceptions -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s USE_PTHREADS=0 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS, WORKERFS"] -O3 -lworkerfs.js -o dist/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-wasm-release: mkdir -p dist && em++ --bind -lworkerfs.js -O3 -std=c++17 -flto --define-macro=REAL_T_IS_DOUBLE -I ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/manifold/include/ -I ./src/wasm/deps/glm/ ./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/collider/libcollider.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/third_party/graphlite/libgraphlite.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/manifold/libmanifold.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release/polygon/libpolygon.a -fexceptions -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s USE_PTHREADS=0 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS, WORKERFS"] -O3 -lworkerfs.js -o dist/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-wasm-release-mt: mkdir -p dist && em++ --bind -lworkerfs.js -O3 -std=c++17 -flto --define-macro=REAL_T_IS_DOUBLE -I ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/manifold/include/ -I ./src/wasm/deps/glm/ ./src/wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release-mt/collider/libcollider.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release-mt/third_party/graphlite/libgraphlite.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release-mt/manifold/libmanifold.a ./src/wasm/deps/manifold/release-mt/polygon/libpolygon.a -fexceptions -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -s USE_PTHREADS=1 -s PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE=navigator.hardwareConcurrency -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["FS, WORKERFS"] -O3 -lworkerfs.js -o dist/web-ifc-mt.js
scripts.build-api: mkdir -p dist/helpers && npm run build-ts-api && npm run build-web-ifc-api-mjs && npm run build-web-ifc-api-browser && npm run build-web-ifc-api-node && cpy README.md dist && cpy package.json dist
scripts.build-ts-api: mkdir -p dist/helpers && cpy 'src/*.ts' dist && cpy 'src/helpers/*' dist/helpers --flat && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && cpy 'dist/web-ifc-api.d.ts' . --rename=web-ifc-api-node.d.ts
scripts.serve-viewer: npm run build-viewer && cd examples/viewer/ && npm run start
scripts.dev: npm run build-viewer && concurrently --kill-others "npm-watch" "cd examples/viewer && npm run start"
scripts.docker-run: npm run docker-run-container && npm run docker-get-compiled-files
